requirement: This code is intended to implement a command execution system for controlling the extension and retraction percentages of ground and sky tracks based on input parameters such as track level, index, direction, and proportional valve percentage.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK CommandExecutor0
VAR_INPUT
	level		:INT;			//1->地轨	2->天轨
	idx			:INT;			//挡板索引编号
	direct		:TargetDirect;	//方向
	percent		:REAL;			//比例阀百分比 传入0-100
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
END_VAR
